005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ICollectionValue;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.FunctionUtils;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IBooleanItem;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.function.IMapItem;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
020
021import java.util.List;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025public final class MapContains {
026  @NonNull
027  public static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
028      .name("contains")
029      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS_MAP)
030      .deterministic()
031      .contextIndependent()
032      .focusIndependent()
033      .argument(IArgument.builder()
034          .name("map")
035          .type(IMapItem.class)
036          .one()
037          .build())
038      .argument(IArgument.builder()
039          .name("key")
040          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.class)
041          .one()
042          .build())
043      .returnType(IBooleanItem.class)
044      .returnOne()
045      .functionHandler(MapContains::execute)
046      .build();
047
048  private MapContains() {
049    // disable construction
050  }
051
052  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
053  @NonNull
054  private static ISequence<?> execute(@NonNull IFunction function,
055      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
056      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
057      IItem focus) {
058    IMapItem<?> map = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(0).getFirstItem(true)));
059    IAnyAtomicItem key = FunctionUtils.asType(ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(arguments.get(1).getFirstItem(true)));
060
061    return IBooleanItem.valueOf(contains(map, key)).asSequence();
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
066   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-map-contains">map:contains</a>.
067   *
068   * @param <V>
069   *          the type of items in the given Metapath map
070   * @param map
071   *          the map of Metapath items that is the target of retrieval
072   * @param key
073   *          the key for the item to retrieve
074   * @return {@code true} if the key exists in the map, or {@code false} otherwise
075   */
076  public static <V extends ICollectionValue> boolean contains(
077      @NonNull IMapItem<V> map,
078      @NonNull IAnyAtomicItem key) {
079    return map.get(key.asMapKey()) != null;
080  }
081}
